metadata.title: CVE-2018-20361 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the hf_assemblyfunction of libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2(FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault andapplication crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: faad2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
